name: Slimey Treasure
description:
Instructions:

Audio is not working with WebGL, if you want audio download the windows version if possible

Move with WASD, pause with P

Instructions in game, go to portal to finish game, collect the jewels and treasure try not to pickup bones as they are worth like nothing and weigh a lot.
